ygData.subject: RE: Salutations, gripes, and tricks
ygData.msgSnippet: you can fear singing.  hehe aye it takes a lot of meleeing but if you have to solo... Shada
ygData.messageBody:
you can fear singing. hehe aye it takes a lot of meleeing but if you have
to solo...

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 9:12 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Salutations, gripes, and tricks
>
>
> From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>
>
>
> "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > Yep chain/fear is fun. You don't need two bards though.
> You can do it
> > alone on stuff that doesn't resist too much. It takes a while only
> > meleeing, but you can solos Sand Giants like this
> eventually, and lone
> > spectres are easy.
>
> Soloing with chains and fear? Don't you need a brass
> instrument out for the
> fear song? If so, that's a LOT of punching :)
>
> Jyzan
